thread.title: rVue to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Financial Results on August 13, 2015
thread.title_full: rVue to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Financial Results on August 13, 2015

title: rVue to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Financial Results on August 13, 2015
text:
rVue to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Financial Results on August 13, 2015 Management to Conduct Conference Call at 4:30 p.m. rVue Holdings, Inc. 2 hours ago ÓÅ± Content preferences Done 
CHICAGO, IL --(Marketwired - August 04, 2015) - rVue Holdings, Inc ., (OTC PINK: RVUE) , the premier advertising technology platform for digital place-based media, announced today that it will release its financial results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2015, on August 13, 2015 after the close of the market. Management will host a conference call to discuss the results at 4:30 p.m. ET that day. 
Details are as follows: A live webcast is accessible at http://public.viavid.com/index.php?id=115862 
About rVue rVue Holdings, Inc. is an advertising technology company providing the digital distribution platform for the Digital Place-Based Advertising industry. The Company connects approximately one million digital screens across 190 networks delivering access to 250 million daily impressions in one simple platform. Backed by the industry's most intuitive and intelligent platform, rVue has the technology, data and expertise to connect brands and targeted consumers where and when it matters most. For more information, please visit http://www.rvue.com . Company Earnings
